required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of ADG106 In Combination With PD-1 Antibody In Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumors and/or Non Hodgkin Lymphoma
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Open-Label, Phase Ib/II Study of ADG106 in Combination With PD-1 Antibody in Advanced Solid Tumors and Relapsed/Refractory Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma

brief_summary.textblock:
This is a Multicenter, Open-Label, Phase Ib/II Study of ADG106 in Combination with PD-1 Antibody in Advanced Solid Tumors and Relapsed/Refractory Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma.
The primary objective of Phase Ib: To evaluate the maximum tolerated dosage (MTD) of ADG106 in combination with PD-1 antibody in advanced solid tumors and relapsed/refractory non-Hodgkin lymphoma, and to determine the recommended phase II clinical studies dosage (RP2D).

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants experiencing dosage limiting toxicity (DLT) in the first treatment cycle of the combination of ADG106 and PD-1 antibody.
primary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of ADG106 and PD-1 antibody (Week 1 Day 1) until 21 days

primary_outcome.measure: Objective response rate (ORR) of the combination of ADG106 and PD-1 antibody in advanced solid tumors and relapsed/refractory non-hodgkin lymphoma
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to measured progressive disease (up to 24 months)

secondary_outcome.measure: Type of adverse event, incidence, grade (according to NCI CTCAE V 5.0 classification), onset time, and relationship to study treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose of ADG106 and PD-1 antibody (Week 1 Day 1) to 28 days post last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the time concentration curve(AUC) from time zero to infinity (AUC0-inf))
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose of ADG106 and PD-1 antibody (Cycle 1 Day 1,each cycle is 21 days) until the last dose (up to 2 years)
From the first dose of ADG106 and PD-1 antibody (Cycle 1 Day 1,each cycle is 21 days) until the last dose (up to 2 years)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to maximum(peak) plasma concentration Tmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose of ADG106 and PD-1 antibody (Cycle 1 Day 1,each cycle is 21 days) until the last dose (up to 2 years)
From the first dose of ADG106 and PD-1 antibody (Cycle 1 Day 1,each cycle is 21 days) until the last dose (up to 2 years)

secondary_outcome.measure: Anti-drug antibody levels of ADG106 and PD-1 antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose of ADG106 and PD-1 antibody (Cycle 1 Day 1,each cycle is 21 days) until the last dose (up to 2 years)

arm_group.arm_group_label: ADG106 combined with PD-1 antibody Dose Escalation Level 1
ADG106 combined with anti PD-1 antibody Dose Escalation Level 2
ADG106 combined with anti PD-1 antibody Expansion Phase

intervention.description: ADG106 injection, intravenous infusion, is administered as body weight every 3 weeks for 21 days as a cycle
intervention.arm_group_label: ADG106 combined with PD-1 antibody Dose Escalation Level 1
ADG106 combined with anti PD-1 antibody Dose Escalation Level 2
ADG106 combined with anti PD-1 antibody Expansion Phase

intervention.description: PD-1 antibody injection is administered as an intravenous infusion and at a dose of 240mg every 3 weeks for 21 days as a cycle
intervention.arm_group_label: ADG106 combined with PD-1 antibody Dose Escalation Level 1
ADG106 combined with anti PD-1 antibody Dose Escalation Level 2
ADG106 combined with anti PD-1 antibody Expansion Phase

clinical_study.keyword: Solid Tumor and Non Hodgkin Lymphoma
